pr_title: fix #2160 Accommodate ASYNC fusion in Mono.metrics()

timeline.bodyText: the Duration in the verify method is an upper bound after which the test times out. 1ms is a bit short, as it could hiccup (eg. on CI machines). I suggest you raise it to Duration.ofSeconds(1) everywhere just to be on the safe side
timeline.author: simonbasle

timeline.message: fixup max duration of verify in tests, 1ms is too short
